SELECT t11.`BIZCODE`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`MEMO`, t1.`ORDERVALUE`, t1.`ORGID`, t1.`ORGNAME`, t1.`ORGSECTORID`, t1.`ORGSECTORNAME`, t1.`ORGSECUSERTYPEID`, t1.`ORGSECUSERTYPENAME`, t1.`ORGUSERID`, t1.`ORGUSERLEVELID`, t1.`ORGUSERLEVELNAME`, t1.`ORGUSERNAME`, t1.`RESERVER`, t1.`RESERVER10`, t1.`RESERVER11`, t1.`RESERVER12`, t1.`RESERVER13`, t1.`RESERVER14`, t1.`RESERVER15`, t1.`RESERVER16`, t1.`RESERVER17`, t1.`RESERVER18`, t1.`RESERVER19`, t1.`RESERVER2`, t1.`RESERVER20`, t1.`RESERVER21`, t1.`RESERVER22`, t1.`RESERVER25`, t1.`RESERVER26`, t1.`RESERVER27`, t1.`RESERVER28`, t1.`RESERVER29`, t1.`RESERVER3`, t1.`RESERVER30`, t1.`RESERVER4`, t1.`RESERVER5`, t1.`RESERVER6`, t1.`RESERVER7`, t1.`RESERVER8`, t1.`RESERVER9`, t1.`TITLENAME`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`USERCODE`, t1.`USERDATA`, t1.`USERDATA2`, t1.`VALIDFLAG` FROM `T_ORGUSER` t1 LEFT JOIN T_ORGSECTOR t11 ON t1.ORGSECTORID = t11.ORGSECTORID LEFT JOIN T_ORG t21 ON t1.ORGID = t21.ORGID WHERE ( ( t21.`ORGID` = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID} OR '64BCDCC1-24AA-42E4-AC7A-FB6F242F3FF1' =#{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID')} OR 'ibzadmin' = (select t.loginaccountname from t_srfloginaccount t where t.loginaccountid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFPERSONID')}) OR instr(t21.levelcode, ( select a.levelcode from t_srforg a where a.orgid = #{srf.sessioncontext.SRFORGID')} ) )=1 ) ) AND ( t1.`VALIDFLAG` = 1 )
